name: D: The Game
description:
This script will install "D" DOS CD edition for Dosbox.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script requires cdrdao and toc2cue to be installed. 
On Debian and Ubuntu type in a terminal: 
sudo apt-get install cdrdao
- You will need the 2 CD only during install
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: D - The Game - CD DOS - DOSBOX

execute.command: cd $GAMEDIR; rm -f -r *.toc; mv disk.cue D_CD1.cue; mv disk.bin D_CD1.bin; mv D_.cue D_CD2.cue; mv D_.bin D_CD2.bin; sed -i 's/disk.bin/D_CD1.bin/g' D_CD1.cue; sed -i 's/D_.bin/D_CD2.bin/g' D_CD2.cue

content:
custom-name: D - The Game - CD DOS - DOSBOX
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tools/Scripts/copycd.sh
- conf: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/D%20-%20The%20Game/D_dosbox.conf
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/D_dosbox.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: d/laura.exe
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: disk
    file: script
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: efc/baby.raw
- execute:
    args: D_
    file: script
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR; rm -f -r *.toc; mv disk.cue D_CD1.cue; mv disk.bin D_CD1.bin;
      mv D_.cue D_CD2.cue; mv D_.bin D_CD2.bin; sed -i 's/disk.bin/D_CD1.bin/g' D_CD1.cue;
      sed -i 's/D_.bin/D_CD2.bin/g' D_CD2.cue
- task:
    commands:
    - imgmount d "D_CD1.cue" "D_CD2.cue" -t iso
    - 'd:'
    - call D:\install.bat
    - exit
    drives:
      c: .
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/D_dosbox_install.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/D_dosbox_install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: conf
